scenario.title: Scenarios
scenario.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete scenario
scenario.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected
scenario.batchDeleteHint: Note: If all scenarios are deleted, a default one will be created automatically.
scenario.mustKeepOne: Must keep at least one scenario
scenario.step1Desc: : Click "Export Scenario" to save data as an Excel file. It's strongly recommended to use this as a template.
scenario.step2Desc: : Edit in Excel. You can adjust values or add new rows/columns following the existing format.
scenario.step3Desc: : Upload the edited file. The system will auto-detect and create a new scenario copy.
scenario.spec1Desc: It's strongly recommended to export first to get a standard template for editing.
scenario.spec2Desc: Do not modify Excel header names (indicator names, material names, etc.).
scenario.spec3Desc: Must contain both "指标管理" and "货物管理" worksheets with unchanged names.
scenario.spec4Desc: Number cells only support digits. Do not add currency symbols or text; empty cells may cause errors.
scenario.spec5Desc: Import creates a new scenario copy and won't overwrite any existing scenarios.
